cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_PL_Repo__c.name: cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_PL_Repo__c
cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_PL_Repo__c.description: Represents the repository of dropdown boxes in a mobile app.

cgc_sync__Business_Area__c.description: Key used to segregate business areas.

cgc_sync__Field__c.description: Salesforce field name of the picklist.

cgc_sync__Has_Empty_Item__c.description: Indicates whether the picklist contains an empty item (true) or not (false).

cgc_sync__ImageId__c.description: Image ID of the icon of the corresponding picklist value.

cgc_sync__Mobile_App_Domain__c.description: Mapping to the domain name of the mobile runtime artifact.

cgc_sync__ShortText_Language_1__c.description: Short text for language 1 to display for this sales org.

cgc_sync__ShortText_Language_2__c.description: Short text for language 2 to display for this sales org.

cgc_sync__ShortText_Language_3__c.description: Short text for language 3 to display for this sales org.

cgc_sync__ShortText_Language_4__c.description: Short text for language 4 to display for this sales org.

cgc_sync__Sort__c.description: Order of values in the picklist.

cgc_sync__Text_Language_1__c.description: Text for language 1 to display for this sales org.

cgc_sync__Text_Language_2__c.description: Text for language 2 to display for this sales org.

cgc_sync__Text_Language_3__c.description: Text for language 3 to display for this sales org.

cgc_sync__Text_Language_4__c.description: Text for language 4 to display for this sales org.
